ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON file from SFTP server to MySQL database UPDATE
ProcessTemplates.Description:
This process will retrieve a **JSON file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MySQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MySQL Database**.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to Json data input file."},"FileName":{"Value":"\"example.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of Json data input file."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"127.0.0.1\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server Address."},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server User."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server User's Password."},"RowIndentifier":{"Value":"\"email\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Column name in dthe database that identifies individual rows."},"MySQLConnectionString":{"Value":"\"connectionstring\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string for MySQL database."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"table\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of table to be updated."}}

Process.Name: JSON file from SFTP server to MySQL database UPDATE
Process.Description:
This process will retrieve a **JSON file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MySQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MySQL Database**.
